## Information

There is no "Banquet" this year. We will instead have a 30 minute window for the team to go get food and pickup any awards we received.

## Timeline


### Wednesday 11/3/2021

- 7pm: Dinner at the conference center

### Thursday 11/4/2021

- 2:10pm EDT Depart from East Campus
- 4:00pm CDT arrive at course for pre-meet
- 6:00pm CDT Check into hotel
- 7:15pm CDT Conference awards time at the hotel
- 9:00pm CDT Coaches Meeting

### Friday 11/5/2021

- 10:15am CDT Depart hotel
- 12:00pm CDT Race 1
- 1:00pm CDT Race 2
